name: Last Step
description:
Controll with:

UpArrow or W  = Up

DownArrow or s = Down

Fire give 20 Bonus-Points

Ice takes 10 away.

My first ever finished game.

If you want to exit you are going to need to kill it with "Alt + F4" sry.

I tried my best alone for the jam. Still many ideas in my head but so little time^^

Hope you have fun!

Greets Tiny
